channel.description: Recent content in Video on DI Herbert Mühlburger

item.title: Blockchain 101
item.description: Have you ever wondered how the Blockchain works? I found an interesting visual illustration about Blockchains by Anders Brownworth. Anders is a coder at Circle, a FinTech company based in the US. (via anders.com and anders.com/blockchain)

item.title: Talk on Infrastructure at Scale: Apache Kafka, Storm and Elastic Search
item.description: The following talk gives a good overview on the technologies used by Loggly.com to build their scalable real-time-search log-processing infrastructure. The slides of the talk can be found here: Infrastructure at Scale: Apache Kafka, Twitter Storm & Elastic Search (ARC303) | AWS re:Invent 2013 from Amazon Web Services (via loggly.com)
